rules.description: Open Chat - Microsoft Teams (Ctrl + Alt + C)
Mobile Portrait Mode (Ctrl + Shift + M) [Only Web Browsers]
1 (Cmd) [Open first pinned Dock app (Finder); +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
2 (Cmd) [Open second pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
3 (Cmd) [Open third pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
4 (Cmd) [Open fourth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
5 (Cmd) [Open fifth pinned Dock app (Finder); +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
6 (Cmd) [Open sixth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
7 (Cmd) [Open seventh pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
8 (Cmd) [Open eighth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
9 (Cmd) [Open ninth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
Tab (Alt) [+IDEs, Remote Desktops, and Terminal Emulators]
